clean_data: Systems Administrator span lSystemsspan span lAdministratorspan Systems Administrator Saint Augustine FL Versatile IT professional with extensive program and project management experience with a strong emphasis on customer retention Proven ability to lead crossfunctional teams to achieve results and meet deliverables Resultsfocused with strong aptitude for identifying and resolving business and technical challenges Accomplished in creating solutions that meet business technology and budget requirements in highly regulated industries Decisive leader and resultsoriented professional recognized for taking on major initiatives adapting to rapidly changing environments and resolving mission critical issues to ensure bottom line success Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Systems Administrator TriState Luxury Collection Edison NJ 2016 to 2019 Led the design implementation and maintenance of applications and daily operations of systems infrastructure and resources for over 400 Mercedes Benz and Lexus users across 4 sites and assisted with an additional eight JaguarLand Rover BMW and Audi stores during periods of high workflow Ensured appropriate measures and processes were implemented for management of all systems business continuity disaster recovery deployment and implementation Provided support administration for the virtual server and the network environment to maintain connectivity capacity upgrade planning and resolve end user problems Delivered desktop support by assessing issues and implementing Windows software and hardware solutions as well as individualized solutions and training Key Achievements Slashed IT budget by 75K annually by eliminating the need for a Managed Service Provider by building the business own network stack Implemented and coordinated TriState Luxurys Ecycling Program that sourced local vendors to recycle the electronic waste and later integrated the program to all dealerships throughout the tristate area Lexus Edison Lexus Bridgewater Acquisition Project Wiped imaged and added new domain to all of Lexus Of Edison Lexus of Bridgewater that included the entire workstation infrastructure into TriStates network within a twoday period Led a team of six in establishing the new site container and added all users and computers into the Server 12 R2 tree and deployed new workstations printers scanners copiers VOIP phones and peripherals General Manager Custom Electronic Design Barnegat NJ 2010 to 2016 Delivered technical solutions to support the organizations vision and strategic direction managing the complete lifecycle of moderatelytohighly complex projects ensuring adherence to timeline scope objectives and budget Responsible for the proper function of crossfunctional teams in coordination with the established priorities and timelines for the design and implementation of voice data video LANS and wireless network systems for residential and commercial clients Collaborated with electricians architects builders and design firms in order to establish solutions that solved business problems Key Achievements Increased revenue by 35 by establishing profitable alliances with local contractors networking and promoting the organization through social media Project Manager Frankentek Residential Systems Medford NJ 2007 to 2010 Lead Technician Frankentek Medford NJ 2007 to 2010 Directed and oversaw a project team to deliver electronic installations domestically and internationally Leveraged deep technology and process expertise to drive execution across multiple interdependent projects and outlined a multigenerational project strategy aligned to deliver on the expected outcomes and defined execution methodologies
